title: Soul Journey | Canyon Ranch Lenox
description: Take a guided spiritual inner journey at renowned Canyon Ranch. Develop intuition that supports healing through a higher state of consciousness, awareness and understanding.
cleaned_text: How It Works Select a focused Pathway with curated services bundled to support your intention. Explore a topic such as healthy weight, life transitions, wellness, or joy. [Close detail panel](/lenox/services/mind-spirit/spiritual-wellness/) Soul Journey Take a guided inner journey to experience your spiritual nature.
